Description: Double-sided blue glazed composition wedjat-eye amulet with a convex face with black detail; flat back; pierced longitudinally.
Curator's comments: Published: Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt (Japan 1999-2000): No 82 Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): fig.46
Exhibition history: Exhibited: The British Museum/National Geographic: Treasures of the Earth. 2005-2006 Oct-Feb, Houston Museum of Natural Sciences, Mummy: The Inside Story 2006 7 Mar-6 Aug, Mobile (Alabama), Gulf Coast Exploreum Science Center, Mummy: The Inside Story 2006-2007 6 Oct-18 Feb, Tokyo, National Museum of Nature and Science, Mummy: The Inside Story 2007 17 Mar-17 Jun, Kobe City Museum, Mummy: The Inside Story 2011 11 June- Present, 3 year renewable, Indianapolis,The Children’s Museum of Indianapolis, Treasures of the Earth
